searchPage.title: Let's 探します
searchPage.inputPlaceholder: Enter text and press comma, Enter, or '、'

generationPage.description: Generate topics based on your proficiency and selected content. The text will be saved in the Reading section of the selected lesson.
generationPage.anonymousDisclaimer: Make it Anonymous (Other users won't know who created this.)

tips.title: Tips
tips.tip1: - Be specific. Give context of what you want.
tips.tip2: - If the decks are too big, not all elements will be used.
tips.tip3: - The model prioritizes the selected Decks.
tips.tip4: - Consider your level. If you scale up the JLPT level, advanced Words and Kanji will appear in the text.
